name: IT Stocklist
tag_list: ict, social-network, trading, sales, buy, it, hardware, software, portal, it-equipment, computer-parts, spare-parts, marketplace
overview: IT Stocklist provides the first Social Networking based B2B IT Trading Portal for Europe. IT Dealers or ICT Companies can share their stocklist, special offers, knowledge and contacts through a social network. IT Stocklist is offering a real time inventory with different types of product conditions like refurbished, new, new open box or renew. The product in the inventory is directly connected to the profile of the User and his Company Profile. This information allows users to contact the inventoy uploader through the Request System or by Live Chat, Internal Message or old-school Telephone. Requests and offers functionalities allows the user to participate from the user database and spare time in purchasing and sales management.
